description:
The course focuses on ‘you’ as the key factor in shaping your own destiny and your future. It has been designed to enable you to follow the videos and use the PDF downloads or Workbook to structure your planning for personal development in the year ahead.

Typical ‘students’ for this program include entrepreneurs or those wanting to carve out a high flying career in a large or small corporate entity. The major themes or terminology within the program focus on the ‘master your potential’ theme.

A PDF Workbook is included in Video 2 and separate chapters for each video can be downloaded as the student progresses through the course, or, if they prefer can download the whole document at the beginning on the program.

You should take this course if you want to:

  • Understand the methodology of the ‘achievement cycle’ to work sequentially through the process
  • Work through personal goals in all eight areas of your life
  • Develop a strong and powerful belief system which will help you to maintain momentum
title: Master Your Potential - Create Your Best Year Yet
